title: Emani neranammu
sahitya:
Emani neranammu kondumu krSNa endukinta vAdu



caraNam 1



jalaga mADuvELa valvalu dAci mammala impaga lEdA



caraNam 2



muditala rammani tilakamulidi pantamOvi-nnokka lEdA



caraNam 3



munu nIvu venna nAraginci taruNula mOmuna bUsi pOlEdA



caraNam 4



vadinegAri candamuna vacci pAvaDa vadalinci pOlEdA



caraNam 5



dorikitivani cAti jeppa bOtE talli uramuna nunDalEdA



caraNam 6



kAminci yagna paTnulu vEDaga vENugAna monarpa lEdA



caraNam 7



A nADu pongali nI kidi konnALLu vAna nuNDa lEdA



caraNam 8



dharanu tyAgarAja vinutuni palukulu tappi bOdana lEdA
